00012 NoSteg::NoSteg(Config* cfg) :
00013         VoIPPacketsManager(cfg) {
00014         templatePacket.delay = config->noStegRTPDelay;
00015 
00016         // TODO inicjalizacja danych na char* ?
00017         vector<char> data = getAudioDataToSend();
00018         templatePacket.data = new char[data.size()];
00019         for (int i = 0; i < (int) data.size(); i++) {
00020                 templatePacket.data[i] = data[i];
00021         }
00022         templatePacket.dataSize = data.size();
00023 }

00029 RTPPacket& NoSteg::getNextPacket() {
00030         PRNBITS_(4, templatePacket.header->toString());
00031         templatePacket.header->nextRTPHeader(NARROW_BAND); // changes sequenceNumber and timestamp
00032         PRNBITS_(4, templatePacket.header->toString());
00033 
00034         templatePacket.delay = config->noStegRTPDelay;
00035         vector<char> data = getAudioDataToSend();
00036         templatePacket.data = new char[data.size()];
00037         templatePacket.dataSize = data.size();
00038         for (int i = 0; i < (int) data.size(); i++) {
00039                 templatePacket.data[i] = data[i];
00040         }
00041         VAR_(4, (int)templatePacket.dataSize);
00042         return templatePacket;
00043 }
00044 
00045 void NoSteg::putReceivedPacketData(RTPPacket& packet) {
00046         //TODO: to moze byc za wolne - lepiej trzymac uchwyt do pliku
00047         ofstream myfile (config->outputAudioFilePath.c_str());
00048         if (myfile.is_open()) {
00049                 myfile.write(packet.data, packet.dataSize);
00050                 myfile.close();
00051         }
00052         else Main::getInstance()->handleError("Unable to open output audio data file: "
00053                                                                                 +config->outputAudioFilePath);
00054 }
